meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a brineless chicken dish for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The brineless pickles tasted fresh and light.
meanings.sent3: I asked for a brineless sandwich, but they gave me a salty one instead!
meanings.sent4: Her brineless salad was a refreshing change from the usual salty options.
meanings.sent5: The brineless soup was a delightful surprise on the menu.

meanings.sent1: The store offered a variety of brineless olives for sale.
meanings.sent2: I prefer brineless snacks as they are healthier for me.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally bought brineless anchovies and couldn't believe the difference in taste.
meanings.sent4: The brineless cheese had a milder flavor compared to the brined ones.
meanings.sent5: The brineless pretzels were a hit at the party due to their unique taste.
